source: ## Import libraries

from pyspark.sql.types import StringType, TimestampType, DateType, IntegerType, DecimalType, BooleanType, StructType
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, lit, udf, to_date
import uuid
## Create functions
uuidUDF = udf(lambda : str(uuid.uuid4()),StringType())
## Import data Southridge

# Read data from lake
df_Southridge_Sales_Customers = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/Southridge/CloudSales/dbo.Customers.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_Southridge_Sales_Customers.printSchema
#display(df_Southridge_Sales_Customers.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_Southridge_Sales_Adresses = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/Southridge/CloudSales/dbo.Addresses.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_Southridge_Sales_Adresses.printSchema
#display(df_Southridge_Sales_Adresses.limit(100))

# Join dataframes
df_Southridge_Sales_Joined = (
    df_Southridge_Sales_Customers.alias('Customers').join(
        df_Southridge_Sales_Adresses.alias('Addresses'),
        df_Southridge_Sales_Customers.CustomerID == df_Southridge_Sales_Adresses.CustomerID,
        'inner'
    )
)

# Display dataframe
#df_Southridge_Sales_Joined.printSchema
#display(df_Southridge_Sales_Joined.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_Southridge_Streaming_Customers = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/Southridge/CloudStreaming/dbo.Customers.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_Southridge_Streaming_Customers.printSchema#
#display(df_Southridge_Streaming_Customers.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_Southridge_Streaming_Adresses = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/Southridge/CloudStreaming/dbo.Addresses.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_Southridge_Streaming_Adresses.printSchema
#display(df_Southridge_Streaming_Adresses.limit(100))

# Join dataframes
df_Southridge_Streaming_Joined = (
    df_Southridge_Streaming_Customers.alias('Customers').join(
        df_Southridge_Streaming_Adresses.alias('Adresses'), 
        df_Southridge_Streaming_Customers.CustomerID == df_Southridge_Streaming_Adresses.CustomerID,
        'inner'
    )
)

# Display dataframe
#df_Southridge_Streaming_Joined.printSchema
#display(df_Southridge_Streaming_Joined.limit(100))
## Import data FourthCoffee

# Read data from lake
df_FourthCoffee = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/FourthCoffee/Rentals/Customers.csv',
                        format='csv',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_FourthCoffee.printSchema
#display(df_FourthCoffee.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_vanArsdel = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/VanArsdel/OnPremRentals/dbo.Customers.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_vanArsdel.printSchema
#display(df_vanArsdel.limit(100))
## Transform data

# Add columns
df_Southridge_Sales_Modified = df_Southridge_Sales_Joined.withColumn("SourceSystemID", lit("1").cast(IntegerType())
                                                         .withColumn("CreatedDate", max(col("Customers.CreatedDate").cast("long"), col("Adresses.CreatedDate").cast("long")))
)

# Rename columns
df_Southridge_Sales_Modified = df_Southridge_Sales_Modified.withColumn("SourceSystemCustomerID", col("Customers.CustomerID"))

# Reorder colums
df_Southridge_Sales_Modified = df_Southridge_Sales_Modified.select(
    'SourceSystemID',
    'SourceSystemCustomerID',
    'LastName',
    'FirstName',
    'AddressLine1',
    'AddressLine2',
    'City',
    'State',
    'ZipCode',
    'PhoneNumber',
    'Customers.CreatedDate',
    'Customers.UpdatedDate',
    'Adresses.CreatedDate',
    'Adresses.UpdatedDate',
    'CreatedDate'
)

# Convert column types
df_Southridge_Sales_Modified = (
    df_Southridge_Sales_Modified.withColumn("SourceSystemID", col("SourceSystemID").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("SourceSystemCustomerID", col("SourceSystemCustomerID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("LastName", col("LastName").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("FirstName", col("FirstName").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("AddressLine1", col("AddressLine1").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("AddressLine2", col("AddressLine2").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("City", col("City").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("State", col("State").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("ZipCode", col("ZipCode").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("PhoneNumber", col("PhoneNumber").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("CreatedDate", col("CreatedDate").cast(DateType()))
                           .withColumn("UpdatedDate", col("UpdatedDate").cast(DateType()))
)

# Display dataframe
#df_Southridge_Sales_Modified.printSchema
#display(df_Southridge_Sales_Modified.limit(100))

# Rename columns
df_Southridge_Streaming_Modified = df_Southridge_Streaming_Joined.withColumnRenamed("CustomerID", "SourceSystemCustomerID")

# Add columns
df_Southridge_Streaming_Modified = (
    df_Southridge_Streaming_Modified.withColumn("SourceSystemID", lit("1").cast(IntegerType()))
)

# Reorder colums
df_Southridge_Streaming_Modified = df_Southridge_Streaming_Modified.select(
    'SourceSystemID',
    'SourceSystemCustomerID',
    'LastName',
    'FirstName',
    'AddressLine1',
    'AddressLine2',
    'City',
    'State',
    'ZipCode',
    'PhoneNumber',
    'CreatedDate',
    'UpdatedDate'
)

# Convert column types
df_Southridge_Streaming_Modified = (
    df_Southridge_Streaming_Modified.withColumn("SourceSystemID", col("SourceSystemID").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("SourceSystemCustomerID", col("SourceSystemCustomerID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("LastName", col("LastName").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("FirstName", col("FirstName").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("AddressLine1", col("AddressLine1").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("AddressLine2", col("AddressLine2").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("City", col("City").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("State", col("State").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("ZipCode", col("ZipCode").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("PhoneNumber", col("PhoneNumber").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("CreatedDate", col("CreatedDate").cast(DateType()))
                           .withColumn("UpdatedDate", col("UpdatedDate").cast(DateType()))
)

# Display dataframe
#df_Southridge_Streaming_Modified.printSchema
#display(df_Southridge_Streaming_Modified.limit(100))

# Rename columns
df_FourthCoffee_Modified = df_FourthCoffee.withColumnRenamed("CustomerID", "SourceSystemCustomerID")

# Add columns
df_FourthCoffee_Modified = (
    df_FourthCoffee_Modified.withColumn("SourceSystemID", lit("2").cast(IntegerType()))
)

# Reorder colums
df_FourthCoffee_Modified = df_FourthCoffee_Modified.select(
    'SourceSystemID',
    'SourceSystemCustomerID',
    'LastName',
    'FirstName',
    'AddressLine1',
    'AddressLine2',
    'City',
    'State',
    'ZipCode',
    'PhoneNumber',
    'CreatedDate',
    'UpdatedDate'
)

# Convert column types
df_FourthCoffee_Modified = (
    df_FourthCoffee_Modified.withColumn("SourceSystemID", col("SourceSystemID").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("SourceSystemCustomerID", col("SourceSystemCustomerID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("LastName", col("LastName").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("FirstName", col("FirstName").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("AddressLine1", col("AddressLine1").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("AddressLine2", col("AddressLine2").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("City", col("City").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("State", col("State").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("ZipCode", col("ZipCode").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("PhoneNumber", col("PhoneNumber").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("CreatedDate", col("CreatedDate").cast(DateType()))
                           .withColumn("UpdatedDate", col("UpdatedDate").cast(DateType()))
)

# Display dataframe
#df_FourthCoffee_Modified.printSchema
#display(df_FourthCoffee_Modified.limit(100))

# Rename columns
df_vanArsdel_Modified = df_vanArsdel.withColumnRenamed("CustomerID", "SourceSystemCustomerID")

# Add columns
df_vanArsdel_Modified = (
    df_vanArsdel_Modified.withColumn("SourceSystemID", lit("3").cast(IntegerType()))
)

# Reorder colums
df_vanArsdel_Modified = df_vanArsdel_Modified.select(
    'SourceSystemID',
    'SourceSystemCustomerID',
    'LastName',
    'FirstName',
    'AddressLine1',
    'AddressLine2',
    'City',
    'State',
    'ZipCode',
    'PhoneNumber',
    'CreatedDate',
    'UpdatedDate'
)

# Convert column types
df_vanArsdel_Modified = (
    df_vanArsdel_Modified.withColumn("SourceSystemID", col("SourceSystemID").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("SourceSystemCustomerID", col("SourceSystemCustomerID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("LastName", col("LastName").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("FirstName", col("FirstName").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("AddressLine1", col("AddressLine1").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("AddressLine2", col("AddressLine2").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("City", col("City").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("State", col("State").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("ZipCode", col("ZipCode").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("PhoneNumber", col("PhoneNumber").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("CreatedDate", col("CreatedDate").cast(DateType()))
                           .withColumn("UpdatedDate", col("UpdatedDate").cast(DateType()))
)

# Display dataframe
#df_vanArsdel_Modified.printSchema
#display(df_vanArsdel_Modified.limit(100))
## Combine all dataframes
df_unioned = df_FourthCoffeeModified.unionAll(df_vanArsdelModified)
## Writing transformed data to lake
df_unioned.write.format('parquet').mode('overwrite').save('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/curated/rentals.parquet')
